Title: Water puddle in corridor
Observation: There was a small puddle of water on the floor of the packaging department, creating a slipping hazard.

Title: Loose handrail on stairs
Observation: The handrail on the metal stairs between production areas was dangerously loose; its fastening had failed.

Title: Inadequate protective equipment
Observation: An employee was handling a powdery substance in the cleanroom without a respirator.

Title: Items left on stairs
Observation: Empty boxes had been left on the top landing of the stairs leading to the warehouse, posing a tripping hazard.

Title: Chemical spill on floor
Observation: A small amount of unknown chemical was on the laboratory floor with no warning signage.

Title: Emergency stop button covered
Observation: A movable cart had been placed in front of the mixing unitâ€™s emergency stop button, preventing quick use.

Title: Slippery stair step
Observation: One step on the stairs leading to the maintenance platform was worn and dangerously slippery.

Title: Heavy lift without lifting aid
Observation: A warehouse worker lifted a heavy raw-material sack alone without any lifting aid.

Title: Fire escape blocked
Observation: A pallet of cardboard waste was standing in front of the emergency exit route, narrowing the passage.

Title: Broken power socket
Observation: The casing of a power socket in the changing room was cracked, creating a risk of electric shock.

Title: Inadequate lighting in stairwell
Observation: Lighting in the stairwell leading to the basement was insufficient; one light bulb was burnt out.

Title: Sharp edge at workstation
Observation: The metal work surface on the packaging line had a sharp edge that could cause injury.

Title: Tools left on floor
Observation: After maintenance work, a wrench and screwdrivers had been left lying on the floor.

Title: Liquid spill on stairs
Observation: Coffee had been spilled on the stairs leading to the break room, causing a slipping hazard.

Title: Dust accumulated in electrical cabinet
Observation: A large amount of dust had accumulated inside an old electrical cabinet in the production area, posing a fire risk.

Title: Incorrect waste sorting
Observation: Reactive chemical waste had been placed in the regular laboratory waste container.

Title: Running on stairs
Observation: An employee was observed running down the office stairway.

Title: Gas cylinders not properly secured
Observation: Gas cylinders in the laboratory were standing freely against the wall without a chain or rack.

Title: Overloaded storage shelf
Observation: More goods had been stacked on a storage shelf than its load limit allows.

Title: Worn cleanroom floor surface
Observation: The cleanroom floor coating was worn through, making cleaning difficult and creating a tripping hazard.

Title: Anti-slip tape coming off step
Observation: Anti-slip tape had come loose and was hanging from the edge of the step leading to the outside door.

Title: Damaged extension cord
Observation: The insulation of an extension cord in the office was broken, exposing the inner wires.

Title: Expired eyewash bottle
Observation: The expiry date on the eyewash bottle at the emergency shower point had passed.

Title: Forklift speeding in warehouse
Observation: A forklift driver in the warehouse area was clearly driving above the permitted speed limit.

Title: Carrying load blocking view on stairs
Observation: An employee carried a large box that completely blocked their view while going up the stairs.

Title: Missing safety data sheet for chemical
Observation: The safety data sheet for a new chemical could not be found at the workstation.

Title: Condensation water dripping on floor
Observation: A ventilation duct in the corridor ceiling was dripping condensation water onto the floor.

Title: Silencer detached from pneumatic device
Observation: The silencer had come off a compressed-air device, causing loud noise.

Title: Pharmaceutical dust left in weighing room
Observation: Pharmaceutical dust remained on surfaces in the weighing room after cleaning.

Title: Poor lighting at back of warehouse
Observation: Lighting at the back of the warehouse was so poor that it was difficult to read product labels.

Title: Trash on stairs to break room
Observation: There was trash and empty coffee cups on the stairs to the break room.

Title: Heavy box at edge of high shelf
Observation: A heavy box was positioned dangerously close to the edge of a high storage shelf.

Title: Door slamming shut
Observation: The door to the production area was slamming shut forcefully, creating a risk of fingers getting trapped.

Title: Open floor hatch without warnings
Observation: A floor hatch had been left open for maintenance work, but there were no proper warning signs around it.

Title: Cable across walkway
Observation: A charging cable had been run across an office corridor, creating a tripping hazard.

Title: Torn protective gloves
Observation: An employee was wearing torn protective gloves while handling a corrosive substance.

Title: Loose stair railing
Observation: The handrail on the main entrance stairs was loose and gave way when leaned on.

Title: Crane safety limit not working
Observation: The upper limit sensor of the production overhead crane was not functioning, creating a collision hazard.

Title: Glass shards on floor
Observation: A decanter glass had fallen in the laboratory and shards had spread over a wide area.

Title: Handwashing station out of soap
Observation: The soap dispenser at the handwashing station before entering the cleanroom was empty.

Title: Slippery outdoor steps in rain
Observation: The factory's outdoor steps were extremely slippery in the rain, with no anti-slip surface.

Title: Emergency exit locked
Observation: One of the emergency exits was locked from the inside with a key.

Title: Falling objects from shelf
Observation: Vibration caused small items to fall from a shelf near the production line.

Title: Wet cloth on stairs
Observation: A cleaner had left a wet cloth to dry on the stair railing, from where it had fallen onto a step.

Title: Poor ergonomics in packing area
Observation: The workbench on the packaging line was too low, forcing workers into a hunched working posture.

Title: Warning sign missing
Observation: No warning sign was placed to indicate the wet floor after cleaning.

Title: Broken stair step
Observation: One of the concrete stair steps had chipped, leaving a sharp edge and a hole.

Title: Noisy machine
Observation: One of the production line machines was emitting an unusually loud, shrill noise.

Title: Icicles on roof edge
Observation: Large icicles were hanging above the main entrance, posing a falling hazard.

Title: Employee using phone on stairs
Observation: An employee was walking down the stairs while looking at their phone screen, with reduced attention.
